snippet.title: Sweave - Official Trailer | Game Devs of Color Expo 2024
snippet.description: Take a look at gameplay from Sweave, a hyper-casual game that showcases the beauty of African culture through its unique patterns, weaves, and symbols. Sweave is named after the combination of the words Weave and Swerve, which represent the weaving motion of the ball and the player's need to dodge obstacles. Sweave is available on Google Play and the App Store.
